DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-266
    As a user I want to create text or text + image posts to share with the community
    Scenario: Verify creating a text-only post

    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to "Community" tab
    3. Click "NEW POST" button
    4. Enter text content
    5. Click "Post" button
    6. Verify post is created successfully
    
    Expected Result: Text-only post should be created and visible in the community feed

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-14
    As a user, I want to log in with my email and password
    Scenario: Login Unsuccessful due to Incorrect Password
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app
    2. Click on "Log in" button
    3. Click on "Sign in with your email" button
    4. Enter valid email: qingqin@topflightapps.com
    5. Enter incorrect password: Aa1234567
    6. Click "Log in" button
    7. Verify error message appears
    
    Expected Result: Error message "The password you entered is incorrect" should be displayed
NAME: test_NAF_2_2_0_login_with_wrong_password

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-15
    As a user, I want to log in with my email and password
    Scenario: Login Unsuccessful due to Non-existent Email

    3. Click on "Sign in with your email" button
    4. Enter non-existent email: test@example.com
    5. Enter password: testpassword
